title: Bug 120922: "Dirty Page" behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improvement
description:
Bug 120922: "Dirty Page" behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improvement.

Current behavior: When other pages are accessed, a dialog pops up asking the user if they want to save the changes. The dialog is titled "Error" (including the quotes) and the options are "Yes", "No", and "Cancel".

Expected behavior: The dialog should have a more appropriate title and the options should be clearer. The title should not include quotes. The message in the dialog should indicate that the XML Report Design has been changed.
OB: When trying to access other pages in the XML Report Designer editor, a dialog titled "Error" (including the quotes) pops up. The options in the dialog are "Yes", "No", and "Cancel".
EB: When trying to access other pages in the XML Report Designer editor after making changes, a dialog should pop up with a more appropriate title. The options in the dialog should clearly indicate what action they will take. The dialog should also mention that the XML Report Design has been changed.
SR:
1. Open the XML Report Designer editor.
2. Make changes to the report design.
3. Try to access other pages in the editor.
4. Observe the dialog titled "Error" (including the quotes) and the options "Yes", "No", and "Cancel".
